overview: Gal has over 20 years of experience in engineering, marketing and business development in Fortune 100 and start-up companies. Prior to Goodmail, Gal served as senior director of product management for Convenos, a startup company in the collaboration and Digital Signage space. Prior to Convenos, Gal was the director of marketing for Transitive Corporation (acquired by IBM) working on breakthrough technology in the Virtualization space. Prior to Transitive, Gal served in several different organizational and product management roles within Intel and National Semiconductor that included engineering management, strategic planning and software product management for CPU and embedded processor architectures. Gal holds an MBA from Pepperdine University and a BSCE degree from Technion â€“ Israel Institute of Technology.
